name: NanoScape
description: NanoScape is a first person, action, space shooter inspired by Galaga and other classic wave based arcade games.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 1.5Ghz or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible/modern shader support Storage: 275 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
